Your First App with Little Background

14 Mar 2015

Everyone has to start somewhere and there are great resources to help you do so. David Gewirtz writes on ZDNet on where to start and how much it might cost you. (Spoiler: not much).

In this article, I’m going to take you through the steps you need to get an app up on the Android and Apple app stores. I’ll outline tools, resources, and steps you’ll need to take. I’ll even show you some tricks for building your own apps without any programming skill whatsoever.Check out the rest of the article here.
